channel.title: CVE Feed for AREAL SAS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AREAL SAS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-50356|2024-08-02T22:16:46.210Z -- areal%20sas -- topkapi%20vision%20%28server%29
item.description: SSL connections to some LDAP servers are vulnerable to a man-in-the-middle attack due to improper certificate validation in AREAL Topkapi Vision (Server). This allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to gather sensitive information and prevent valid users from login.

item.title: CVE-2023-50357|2024-08-02T22:16:46.735Z -- areal%20sas -- webserv1
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability in the AREAL SAS Websrv1 ASP website allows a remote low-privileged attacker to gain escalated privileges of other non-admin users.
